resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107464</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107464</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Nuclear Physics </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kernphysik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique Nucléaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Física Nuclear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fisica Nucleare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρηνική φυσική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Física Nuclear</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Start a chain reaction, or introduce non-radioactive isotopes to prevent one. Watch alpha particles escape from a Polonium nucleus, causing radioactive alpha decay. Control energy production in a nuclear reactor!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen Sie eine Kettenreaktion, oder führen Sie
inaktive Isotope ein, um ein zu verhindern. Überwachen Sie 
Alphateilchen, von einem Polonium Kern zu entgehen und radioaktiven 
Alphazerfall verursachen. Steuern Sie Energieproduktion in einem
Kernreaktor!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commencez une réaction en chaîne, ou présentez 
les isotopes non radioactifs pour empêcher un. Observez les 
particules d'alpha s'échapper d'un noyau de Polonium, causant la 
désintégration alpha radioactive. Contrôlez la production 
énergétique dans un réacteur nucléaire !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comece uma reação chain, ou introduza isotopes 
non-radioactive para impedir um. Preste atenção a partículas 
de alfa escapar-se de um núcleo de Polonium, causando a 
deterioração de alfa radioativa. Controle a produção de 
energia em um reator nuclear!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inizi una reazione a catena, o introduca gli 
isotopi non radioattivi per impedire uno. Guardi le particelle 
di alfa fuoriuscire da un nucleo di Polonium, causante il decadimento 
alfa radioattivo. Gestisca la produzione di energia in un 
reattore nucleare!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχίστε μια αλυσιδωτή αντίδραση, ή εισάγετε τα 
μη-ραδιενεργά ισότοπα για να αποτρέψετε ενός. Προσέξτε τα 
άλφα μόρια δραπετεύει από έναν polonium πυρήνα, προκαλώντας 
τη ραδιενεργό άλφα αποσύνθεση. Ελέγξτε την ενεργειακή 
παραγωγή σε έναν πυρηνικό αντιδραστήρα!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comience una reacción en cadena, o introduzca los
isótopos no radiactivos para prevenir uno. Mire las partículas
alfa escaparse de un núcleo de Polonium, causando decaimiento de alfa
radiactivo. ¡Controle la producción energética en un reactor 
nuclear!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211359</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107464</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/nuclear-physics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
